title: Mock Trial with J. Reinhold
description: J. Reinhold presides* over mock court cases. *Judge Reinhold is neither a real judge, nor has he received acting’s highest honor.
quote: Well it looks like we’ve got a mistrial. But on the plus side, we’ve also got a Hung Jury. Hit it!
altHero: Judge Reinhold smiles from the bench
alt1: William Hung plays keyboard and sings with his band
alt3: Lucille Bluth holds a tissue on the witness stand
